product_name: White Sierra Sierra Mountain Fleece Vest - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: The men's Sierra Mountain fleece vest from White Sierra keep your core warm with the excellent insulation of brushed polyester fleece. Soft, non-pilling 300-weight polyester fleece retains warmth, continuing to insulate even if wet. Full-length zipper provides easy ventilation when it warms up. The men's Sierra Mountain fleece vest from White Sierra features a drawcord hem to seal in warmth. Handwarmer pockets. Special buy.
short_description: The men's Sierra Mountain fleece vest from White Sierra keep your core warm with the excellent insulation of brushed polyester fleece.
